title: Bill would shield recyclers from PFAS cleanup costs - Resource Recycling
summary: The article discusses a bill introduced in the U.S. Senate to protect composting, recycling, and garbage facilities from liability due to PFAS contamination. The legislation exempts these facilities from cleanup costs related to PFAS chemicals under the federal Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act (CERCLA).
